about.title: About Panorama Scholarly Group
about.missionText: To facilitate cross-cultural intellectual dialogue and disseminate high-quality research results to the global academic community through rigorous peer review and open access publishing.
about.heritageText: Rooted in German academic tradition, we uphold the highest standards of scholarly publishing, ensuring quality through double-blind peer review and ethical publication practices.
about.standardsText: All our publications undergo rigorous double-blind peer review, adhere to international publication ethics, and are freely accessible under open access licenses.
about.storyText: Founded with a vision to bridge Eastern and Western academic traditions, Panorama Scholarly Group has grown into a global network of scholars, researchers, and practitioners committed to advancing knowledge across disciplines.
about.excellenceText: We strive for the highest quality in everything we publish.
about.integrityText: We maintain the highest ethical standards in scholarly publishing.
about.innovationText: We embrace new ideas and technologies to advance research.
about.globalText: We connect scholars from around the world.
